title: Sri Lanka: Police release details of fatalities, & property damage from Monday’s (9) clashes
body_lines: Colombo (News 1st); Sri Lanka Police on Tuesday (10) released the details of the number of people who died following Monday’s (9) clashes and also the number of property that was damaged.
6 deaths were reported from the Western Province, & 2 deaths were reported from the Southern Province.
A total of 47 vehicles were set on fire, while 38 houses were also torched.
Armed forces ordered to open fire at looters & those who cause bodily harm
